channel.title: Shortcuts for Redash
channel.description:
Hi there, does anyone has a list of shortcuts to use? I'm specifically looking for Mac shortcuts. Super helpful would be if it's working with a german keyboard even.
I couldn't find any lists anywhere yet.
Thank you for your help!

item.title: Shortcuts for Redash
item.dc:creator: Gerardo
item.description:
Ctrl + u Cambiar a mayúsculas
Ctrl + Shift + u Cambiar a minúsculas
Ctrl + K fijar una seleccion
Ctrl + Y contrario a Ctrl + z
Ctrl + D borrar toda la fila, borrar seleccion
Ctrl + p agregar parametro, crear parametro

Read full topic

item.title: Shortcuts for Redash
item.dc:creator: placajack1
item.description:
⌘+Enter -> Rerun Query
⌘+S -> Save Query
⌘+ / -> Comment / Uncomment line
⌃ + Space, autofill

Read full topic
